course.description: This is a focused course for students who have previously taken the PSAT exam as a sophomore but did not receive a desired score on the writing skills portion or students who will be taking the PSAT and wish to strengthen their skills in the writing skills area. Outcomes of the course will be measured using the original PSAT writing skills score or the course pre-test compared to both the subsequent PSAT writing skills score and a course post-test.
